reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor, explains concepts clearly. Sometimes assignments can be a bit tough.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Amazing lectures, very helpful during office hours. Exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Content is interesting but lectures can be dry. Make sure to study the textbook.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and provides plenty of resources to help students succeed.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Lectures are disorganized and the exams are way too difficult.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Very passionate about the subject, but expects a lot from students.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are informative but can be a bit slow. Participation is key.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Fantastic professor, very approachable and cares about students' understanding.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are clear, but you need to stay on top of the readings to do well.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting material but grading can be harsh. Participation is important.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Super engaging and really brings the subject to life. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in lectures, but office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Interesting lectures with lots of visuals. Be prepared for a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Wonderful professor who is very passionate about music. Very supportive.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Content is good, but lectures can be a bit dry. Exams are fair though.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Great professor, really knowledgeable. Can be tough, but worth it.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.review: Not the best at explaining complex concepts. Labs are a bit chaotic.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Amazing professor with real-world experience. Very engaging lectures.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Good professor, but you need to put in the work to understand the material.

reviews.subject: Education
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and passionate. Lectures are engaging and informative.
